EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Fearless
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Fear. Each Core ability in Legendary Dreadnought (including this one) grants +25 Maximum Hit Points, +10 Melee Power, and +6 Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Weaponmaster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to Attack and Damage with all Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Thick Skinned
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +15 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Epic Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Tactics DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Momentum Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Melee or Ranged attack that builds Martial Charges.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Momentum Swing
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Builder: AOE Melee Attack: +[2/3/4][W]. On Hit: Target gains a stack of Terror. Grants 1 Martial Charge on use. Rank 3: You have +1 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier with this attack. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Momentum Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Builder: Ranged Attack: +[2/3/4][W]. On Hit: Target gains a stack of Terror. Grants 1 Martial Charge on use. Rank 3: You have +1 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier with this attack. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Dread Mantle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Legendary Dreadnought Destiny Mantle: Every 3 seconds while this Mantle is active, nearby enemies gain a stack of Terror. Terror: -1 melee and ranged power, -3 Spell Power, -1 AC. stacks up to 15 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Shrug Off Punishment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30] Maximum Hit Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Push Through The Line
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activating an Action Boost grants +[1/2/3] to all Ability Scores for the duration of that Action Boost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Extra Action Boosts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] additional Action Boost use per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Lay Waste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Melee or Ranged attack that spends Martial Charges.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lay Waste (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Spender: Melee Attack: +[4/5/6][W]. You have +1 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier with this attack. On hit, the target must make a save DC (10 + Highest Ability Score + Sundering Bonuses) or take the effects of the Sunder feat, and must make a separate save DC (10 + Highest Ability Score + Trip Bonuses) or take the effects of the Trip feat. The DCs for these are increased by 2 for every Martial Charge consumed. Cooldown: 25 Seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lay Waste (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Spender: Ranged Attack: +[4/5/6][W]. You have +1 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier with this attack. On hit, the target must make a save DC (10 + Highest Ability Score + Sundering Bonuses) or take the effects of the Sunder feat, and must make a separate save DC (10 + Highest Ability Score + Trip Bonuses) or take the effects of the Trip feat. The DCs for these are increased by 2 for every Martial Charge consumed. This ability does not hit multiple targets when you have Improved Precise Shot enabled. Cooldown: 25 Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Life and Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Positive and Negative Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Strike Twice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6]% Doublestrike and Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Epic Power Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Power Attack grants +[1/2/3] extra damage while active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Critical Damage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Revel in Fear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each Martial Charge you have grants +1 to Tactical DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Sow Discord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Dread Mantle, activating an Action Boost adds 1 stack of Terror and the Shaken effect to all enemies in range of your Mantle. +1 Martial Charge cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Armor of Dusk
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Armor Class and Maximum Dexterity Bonus. -[1/2/3] Armor Check Penalty to Skills.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Wrath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activating a Tactical Feat has a [10/20/30]% chance to grant you +1 Martial Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Combat Brute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have any Action Boost active, your weapons gain +1[W].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Kick While They're Down
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Dreadnought Destiny Mantle, you deal +[5/10/15]% damage to Helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Dread
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Dreadnought Destiny Mantle, you gain +15 Physical Resistance Rating and your Mantle also harms nearby enemies, dealing Bane damage every 3 seconds. For non-Bosses, this damage is equal to 1% of their current Hitpoints per stack of Terror they have. Bosses and Raid Bosses instead take 1d6 Bane damage per stack of Terror.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Strike with Fear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your weapon attacks against creatures that are Afraid, Shaken, or have 5+ stacks of Terror add one stack of Vulnerability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Empty Slot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Empty Slot in this preview, intended to be filled later.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Legendary Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Tactical DCs. If you have the Tactician feat, you also gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Terror Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Melee or Ranged Attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Terror Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Single Target Melee Attack: +4[W] attack. Attack is considered an automatic critical. 20 second cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Terror Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Single Target Ranged Attack: +4[W] attack. Attack is considered an automatic critical. 20 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Dusk Surge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Dreadnought Destiny Mantle, hitting enemies with your weapons has a chance to regenerate with your weapons has a chance to regenerate an Action Boost charge. Does not stack with Alchemical Conservation and Draconic Reinvigoration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Dire Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Charge forward at the targeted foe. That foe and all nearby foes are subject to +2[W] damage and have a chance to be stunned. Stun DC is (20 + highest of your STR/DEX/CON Modifier + bonus to stun attacks). 12 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Overpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a boost to Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing weapons

EnhancementSelection.Name: Impaler
EnhancementSelection.Description: When using a Piercing weapon in your main hand, you gain +1 Critical Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lacerator
EnhancementSelection.Description: When using a Slashing weapon in your main hand, you gain +1 Critical Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pulverizor
EnhancementSelection.Description: When using a Bludgeoning weapon in your main hand, you gain +1 Critical Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.
